achievements.name: First Gear Saver
achievements.description: Save your first $500 toward your new car in just 3 weeks. Every journey starts with a single step - let's get rolling!

achievements.name: Daily Drive Discipline
achievements.description: Save at least $15 every day for 5 consecutive days. Small daily habits lead to big wins!

achievements.name: Budget Roadmap
achievements.description: Learn to track your expenses like a pro with this interactive budgeting game. Knowledge is power when saving for big goals!

achievements.name: Car Fund Kickstart
achievements.description: Reach $1,000 in your car savings fund within 6 weeks. You're 10% of the way to your dream car!

achievements.name: Foundation Builder
achievements.description: Save $2,000 over 8 weeks while managing your student loan payments. Balance is the key to financial success!

achievements.name: Weekly Warrior
achievements.description: Maintain a 7-day streak saving $25 daily. Consistency builds the foundation for reaching big goals!

achievements.name: Mid-Journey Milestone
achievements.description: Hit the $4,000 mark in your car savings - you're almost halfway there! The finish line is in sight!

achievements.name: Two-Week Turbo
achievements.description: Save $35 per day for 14 consecutive days. You're accelerating toward your goal faster than ever!

achievements.name: Investment Explorer
achievements.description: Learn about low-risk investment options through this simulation. Make your car fund work harder while staying safe!

achievements.name: Halfway Hero
achievements.description: Reach the major milestone of $6,500 saved for your car. You're over halfway to driving off the lot!

achievements.name: Three-Week Champion
achievements.description: Achieve a 21-day streak saving $50 daily. Your commitment to your car goal is unstoppable!

achievements.name: Final Stretch Sprint
achievements.description: Push to $9,000 in your car fund over 10 weeks. The keys to your new car are almost in hand!

achievements.name: Monthly Master
achievements.description: Complete a full 30-day streak saving $60 daily. Your discipline is what separates dreamers from achievers!

achievements.name: Down Payment Ready
achievements.description: Reach $11,500 saved - enough for a solid down payment on your new car! Financial independence feels incredible!

achievements.name: Financial Planning Pro
achievements.description: Master advanced budgeting and car financing strategies through this challenge. Make the smartest purchase decision!

achievements.name: Six-Week Elite
achievements.description: Maintain a 45-day streak saving $70 daily. You're in the top tier of committed savers!

achievements.name: New Car Champion
achievements.description: Achieve your ultimate goal of $14,000 saved for your new car in 12 months! You did it - financial security and independence are yours!

achievements.name: Two-Month Legend
achievements.description: Complete an epic 60-day streak saving $80 daily. You've proven that commitment plus consistency equals success!

achievements.name: Wealth Builder Mastery
achievements.description: Complete the comprehensive financial independence course. You now have all the tools to achieve any financial goal!
